memories.content: Waves 1-10 property/deal/document CRUD (2026-01-14). Market Data Pipeline: DB 253K records (2026-02-05). ReportSettings + Zod validation (2026-02-07). Sales Analysis Dashboard: 10 endpoints, 6 visualizations (2026-02-10). Construction Pipeline COMPLETE: 5 DB tables, CoStar, 6 API clients, scheduler, Leaflet map (2026-02-11). UW Model Grouping Pipeline: 6 modules, 11 endpoints, 137 tests (2026-02-11). UW Model Phase 3-4 COMPLETE: 30 groups, 244 files, field remaps, batch extraction, approval workflow (2026-02-12). Technical Debt Cleanup: reminder dismissals → DB, E2E tests (116), CI fixes (2026-02-12). Sparkline placeholder indicator: empty arrays instead of fake data, amber warning badge (2026-02-12). Activity logging: ActivityLog model, CRUD, 2 endpoints, 25 tests (2026-02-12). OpenAPI export: 144 endpoints, 134 schemas in docs/openapi.json (2026-02-12). Docker production config: compose, Dockerfiles, nginx, .env.example (2026-02-12). Latest commit: 684f70d. Tests: 1615+ backend, 521 frontend.

conda env: dashboard-backend. Backend port 8000, Frontend port 5173. Git: stash apply over pop, don't push unless asked. NO mock data, NO fake data — show errors instead. Commit strategy: split by logical area, push when asked. User demands thorough validation — test ALL files. User open to parallel Claude Agent Teams for independent work streams.

pydantic-settings 2.x: CORS_ORIGINS must be JSON array. Single .env in project root, symlinked from backend/.env. Main DB: PostgreSQL localhost:5432/dashboard_interface_data. Alembic head: 7c415cc1b77a (activity_logs). SQLite in tests: no server_default, DateTime(timezone=True), datetime.now(UTC). Pre-commit hooks: ruff, ruff-format, mypy — all must pass. React Rules of Hooks: ALL hooks before conditional returns. Schema→Model enum conversion: use ModelEnum(schema_enum.value).

SHAREPOINT: FILE_PATTERN=.*UW.*Model.*vCurrent.*, CUTOFF_DATE=2024-07-15. UW GROUPING: 30 active groups (244 files), 9 Proforma deferred. PHASE 3: 2 groups need custom references (group_5: +2 row, group_34: +6 row). 28 groups use production reference. PHASE 4 API: /grouping/approve, /grouping/extract-batch, /grouping/extract, /grouping/validate.
LOW: Hosting setup (Oracle Cloud Free Tier or Hetzner CX22 with Tailscale). FUTURE: Mobile-friendly iOS version, Proforma groups extraction.
